rows.label: bf06380100_0010
rows.name: The right...

rows.label: bf06380100_0020
rows.name:
To be honest,
I still don't fully understand what he meant by that...

rows.label: bf06380100_0030
rows.name:
Whether he simply meant the coexistence of
humans and Blades, or something more...

rows.label: bf06380100_0040
rows.name: But I think he made a difficult choice.

rows.label: bf06380100_0050
rows.name: For the sake of everyone's survival...

rows.label: bf06380100_0060
rows.name: Whoa!

rows.label: bf06380100_0070
rows.name: Your Majesty!

rows.label: bf06380100_0080
rows.name: What is this?!

rows.label: bf06380100_0090
rows.name: It's Genbu...

rows.label: bf06380100_0100
rows.name:
It's broken free of our control and
started to dive into the clouds!

rows.label: bf06380100_0110
rows.name: What? Are you certain?!

rows.label: bf06380100_0120
rows.name: Ungh-!

rows.label: bf06380100_0130
rows.name: Saika!

rows.label: bf06380100_0140
rows.name: O-oh, no...

rows.label: bf06380100_0150
rows.name: What exactly is happening?

rows.label: bf06380100_0160
rows.name: Could it be...that blast...?!

rows.label: bf06380100_0170
rows.name: Old man!

rows.label: bf06380100_0175
rows.name: What is he...?

rows.label: bf06380100_0180
rows.name: Luxuria keeps Genbu under control using the Sanctus Chain.

rows.label: bf06380100_0190
rows.name: But firing the ether accelerator...

rows.label: bf06380100_0200
rows.name:
It could've created a counter-flow
in Genbu's ether conduits...

rows.label: bf06380100_0210
rows.name: causing a critical overload.

rows.label: bf06380100_0220
rows.name: ...So Genbu's broken?

rows.label: bf06380100_0230
rows.name: Oh no. My words can't reach him anymore...

rows.label: bf06380100_0240
rows.name:
Genbu is just going to dive deeper and deeper...
Then...

rows.label: bf06380100_0250
rows.name:
Dumb old git! That's what happens when you use
antiquated parts!

rows.label: bf06380100_0260
rows.name: The Cloud Sea has a similar density to water.

rows.label: bf06380100_0270
rows.name: As we dive, the pressure will keep building.

rows.label: bf06380100_0280
rows.name: By 500 peds, a human would be crushed completely...

rows.label: bf06380100_0290
rows.name: And all that force will weigh down on Genbu?

rows.label: bf06380100_0300
rows.name: What's our depth now?!

rows.label: bf06380100_0310
rows.name: Twenty-two hundred peds, Sir!

rows.label: bf06380100_0320
rows.name: We are diving at a rate of 120 peds per minute!

rows.label: bf06380100_0330
rows.name: And Genbu's depth limit?

rows.label: bf06380100_0340
rows.name: 25,000, give or take...

rows.label: bf06380100_0350
rows.name: ...That'd give us just over three hours.

rows.label: bf06380100_0360
rows.name: Whoa, Turtle-chan's good at maths...

rows.label: bf06380100_0370
rows.name: Bite me.

rows.label: bf06380100_0380
rows.name: This ain't good.

rows.label: bf06380100_0390
rows.name:
Hey, chum. There's a pressure-resistant pod in the
palace's southern tower.

rows.label: bf06380100_0400
rows.name: You guys at least should get in and escape.

rows.label: bf06380100_0410
rows.name: What about you and everyone else?

rows.label: bf06380100_0420
rows.name: Don't worry about us.

rows.label: bf06380100_0430
rows.name: How can I possibly not worry about you?!

rows.label: bf06380100_0440
rows.name:
Isn't there any other way?
Some way to save everyone?!

rows.label: bf06380100_0450
rows.name: Only Saika can tell Genbu what to do.

rows.label: bf06380100_0460
rows.name: If it won't budge for her, it's no use.

rows.label: bf06380100_0470
rows.name:
Apart from that, all we can do is try to evacuate
as many people as we can...

rows.label: bf06380100_0480
rows.name: But with just three hours...

rows.label: bf06380100_0490
rows.name:
I think you mentioned before...
You control Genbu using the Sanctus Chain, right?

rows.label: bf06380100_0500
rows.name: Uh, yeah, but...

rows.label: bf06380100_0510
rows.name: Where is it?

rows.label: bf06380100_0520
rows.name: Inside Genbu's head.

rows.label: bf06380100_0530
rows.name:
It's straight south from the palace,
through Genbu's spinal column.

rows.label: bf06380100_0540
rows.name: I will go.

rows.label: bf06380100_0550
rows.name:
You'll go?
Homura, what are you-

rows.label: bf06380100_0560
rows.name:
The Sanctus Chain is originally
Serpent's control core.

rows.label: bf06380100_0570
rows.name: And Serpent is my Device

rows.label: bf06380100_0580
rows.name:
I can't be 100% sure, but I think
I might be able to fix it.

rows.label: bf06380100_0590
rows.name: Homura...

rows.label: bf06380100_0600
rows.name: Homura being serious?

rows.label: bf06380100_0610
rows.name: They try to kill Homura-chan one minute ago!

rows.label: bf06380100_0620
rows.name:
That's a totally separate issue.
...Isn't that what you'd say, Rex?

rows.label: bf06380100_0630
rows.name: Wha-? Oh, yeah. I guess it is.

rows.label: bf06380100_0640
rows.name: And that's why.

rows.label: bf06380100_0650
rows.name: Homura-chan...

rows.label: bf06380100_0660
rows.name:
Tora get it. Then Tora and
Hana also lend help!

rows.label: bf06380100_0670
rows.name: Looks like we're in too. Byakko?

rows.label: bf06380100_0680
rows.name: I would have it no other way.

rows.label: bf06380100_0690
rows.name:
That's settled then.
Stay out of our way, old man! Got it?

rows.label: bf06380100_0700
rows.name: You would all...risk your lives for this?

rows.label: bf06380100_0710
rows.name:
For the sake of Luxuria, though we
attempted to destroy the Holy Grail?

rows.label: bf06380100_0720
rows.name: It's not about Luxuria.

rows.label: bf06380100_0730
rows.name: Then why?

rows.label: bf06380100_0740
rows.name:
You're a king, right?
You ought to be able to figure it out.

rows.label: bf06380100_0750
rows.name: Rex, you are...

rows.label: bf06380100_0760
rows.name: Meleph?

rows.label: bf06380100_0770
rows.name: You leave me little choice.

rows.label: bf06380100_0780
rows.name:
Zeke, where was the Fetter again?
How do we get there?

rows.label: bf06380100_0790
rows.name:
I won't just tell ya.
I'll take you right to it!

rows.label: bf06380100_0800
rows.name: Zeke...

rows.label: bf06380100_0810
rows.name:
Save it, old man. You better make a start on
evacuating the people.

rows.label: bf06380100_0820
rows.name: Though, with us on the case...

rows.label: bf06380100_0830
rows.name: Your efforts are probably going to be wasted!

rows.label: bf06380100_0840
rows.name: ...Understood.

rows.label: bf06380100_0850
rows.name:
No time for chit-chat.
Let's go!

rows.label: bf06380100_0860
rows.name: Yeah!
